dmca.title: Copyright
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: media.relations@bbc.co.uk [mailto:media.relations@bbc.co.uk] 
Sent: Friday, October 15, 2004 6:46 PM
To: legal@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright

Dear Sirs, 

It has been bought to our attention that a server under your control is 
distributing BBC copyrighted material 
using the peer to peer software BitTorrent. 

The server in question has the ip address - 67.19.109.50 - and is using the
domainname 'uknova.com'.  This is being hosted by 'teira.net'. 

We demand that you immediately cease the distribution of all infringing
works derived from the BBC. 

Sincerely,

Joseph Mason
Media Relations Office
British Broadcasting Corporation C 2001-2004
Broadcasting House,
Portland Place,
London,
W1A 1AA
